title: Curtis Mayfield - Baden-Baden 1990 - DVD-PAL
description:
Here is a very nice tv broadcast from an excellent Curtis Mayfield performance.

Check my account for more great music videos.

Please enjoy, share with friends and please seed :)

Curtis Mayfield
Baden-Baden 1990
Ohne Filter
ARD 1 fernsehen (German TV)

Ard 1 (analogue Satellite broadcast)>Hi-Fi-VHS-VCR (master>Philips stand alone DVD recorder>Fully authored using MMEP.


Setlist:
01 - Titles/Intro
02 - Superfly
03 - It's Alright
04 - Gypsy Woman
05 - Do Be Down
06 - Freddie's Dead
07 - Pusherman
08 - Billy Jack
09 - We Gotta Have Peace
10 - People Get Ready
11 - Move On Up
12 - To Be Invisible
Run time:- 00:58:12
Extras
01 - Freddies Dead - 197?
02 - Keep On Keepin' On - OGWT 1972
03 - We Gotta Have Peace - OGWT 1972
04 - Superfly - ?
Run time:- 16:53

Some words stolen from www.
He is in great form singing his compositions from his 'Impressions' days (a stupendous "Gypsy Woman"), the days of his breakthrough soundtrack for the movie "SuperFly" ("Freddie's Dead", "Pusher Man", and "SuperFly" itself) and songs from his later period. "Pieces De Resistance", the best of the best, in this uniformly great set, in addition to the aforementioned songs, include "People Get Ready", "Move On Up", "We Gotta Have Peace", and a heartfelt "To Be Invisible". The audience seems to be enjoying themselves a lot. His backup group, hailing mainly from the Atlanta Ga area, is superb in solo and backup modes, and Mr Mayfield is totally free to put on a great show in a relaxed mode.
